title: 132: Enhancing Your Intuition with Natalie Miles
itunes:title: 132: Enhancing Your Intuition with Natalie Miles
description:
Natalie Miles is a real-deal intuitive and in this conversation, we discuss many of YOUR biggest questions such as:
-How do I connect with my spirit guides?
-What do angel numbers mean?
-What is the difference between a guide/ angel/ or my higher self?
-How can we heal our ancestral trauma?
-What is going on in the cosmos today

Remember, your outer world is a refletion of your inner world. If you are ready to live a life of abundance, come join me on my Abundance Mindset Masterclass where we will break through your money blocks that are holding you back from living a life of freedom, purpose and joy. This is a much-requested class after my abundance podcasts and I’m so excited to be teaching you the very lessons that have totally shifted my life. The masterclass includes an interactive live webinar with me and is and just $35.

Join my Abundance Mindset Masterclass at abundancemindsetmasterclass.com

Connect with Natalie at @nataliemiles nataliemiles.com

Receive 30 day trial free and an extra 25% off your already discounted 50% Thrive Market Order (they have tons of Ayurvedic stuff like tongue scrapers and oils too!) at Thrivemarket.com/sahara

Get $50 off your mattress at casper.com/sahara using coupon code "sahara" at checkout

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books

This podcast is for educational purposes only. The host claims no responsibility to any person or entity for any liability, loss, or damage caused or alleged to be caused directly or indirectly as a result of the use, application, or interpretation of the information presented herein.
